statements: SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes;
SELECT process_name, start_date FROM manufacturing_processes;
SELECT process_id, quality_standard FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE quality_standard = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT process_name, end_date FROM manufacturing_processes ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE process_id = 1;
SELECT process_name, quality_standard FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT process_id, process_name, start_date, end_date FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT process_name, quality_standard FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE process_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY process_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE quality_standard LIKE '%ISO%' AND (start_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31');
SELECT * FROM Manufacturing;
SELECT product_name, quantity_produced FROM Manufacturing WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT manufacturing_date, quantity_produced FROM Manufacturing ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturing_id, facility_id, product_name, manufacturing_date, quantity_produced FROM Manufacturing WHERE quantity_produced > 100;

SELECT manufacturing_id, product_name, test_type, test_date, pass_status FROM Manufacturing JOIN QualityControl ON Manufacturing.manufacturing_id = QualityControl.manufacturing_id WHERE pass_status = true;
SELECT manufacturing_id, facility_id, product_name, manufacturing_date, quantity_produced FROM Manufacturing ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC, quantity_produced ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_produced, manufacturing_date FROM Manufacturing WHERE facility_id = 100 ORDER BY manufacturing_date ASC;

SELECT q.qc_id, q.test_type, q.test_date, q.pass_status, m.product_name FROM QualityControl q JOIN Manufacturing m ON q.manufacturing_id = m.manufacturing_id WHERE q.test_type = 'Stress Test' AND q.pass_status = TRUE;
SELECT m.manufacturing_id, m.product_name, q.test_type, q.test_date, q.pass_status FROM Manufacturing m JOIN QualityControl q ON m.manufacturing_id = q.manufacturing_id ORDER BY m.product_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(quantity_produced) AS max_quantity_produced, MIN(quantity_produced) AS min_quantity_produced, AVG(quantity_produced) AS avg_quantity_produced FROM Manufacturing;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_process;
SELECT process_id, product_name FROM manufacturing_process WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT process_id, product_name, start_date, end_date FROM manufacturing_process ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT standard_id, parameter_name, value, target_range FROM quality_standards WHERE value > target_range;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, outcome FROM compliance_audit WHERE outcome = 'Failed';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_process;
SELECT product_name, start_date FROM manufacturing_process WHERE status='Completed';
SELECT p.product_name, q.parameter_name FROM manufacturing_process p JOIN quality_standards q ON p.process_id = q.standard_id;
SELECT p.start_date, q.value, q.target_range FROM manufacturing_process p JOIN quality_standards q ON p.process_id = q.standard_id WHERE q.value > 5;

SELECT a.process_id, a.standard_id, a.audit_date, p.product_name, q.parameter_name, a.outcome FROM compliance_audit a JOIN manufacturing_process p ON a.process_id = p.process_id JOIN quality_standards q ON a.standard_id = q.standard_id WHERE a.outcome='Pass';
SELECT * FROM Manufacturing_Sites;
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM Manufacturing_Sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT site_id, location FROM Manufacturing_Sites WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Manufacturing_Units WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT unit_name, capacity FROM Manufacturing_Units JOIN Manufacturing_Sites ON Manufacturing_Units.site_id = Manufacturing_Sites.site_id;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturing_Sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM Manufacturing_Sites ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT unit_name, capacity FROM Manufacturing_Units WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY unit_name ASC;
SELECT unit_name, start_date, end_date FROM Manufacturing_Records WHERE quantity_produced >= 500 ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT site_name, unit_name, quantity_produced FROM Manufacturing_Sites JOIN Manufacturing_Units ON Manufacturing_Sites.site_id = Manufacturing_Units.site_id JOIN Manufacturing_Records ON Manufacturing_Units.unit_id = Manufacturing_Records.unit_id WHERE quantity_produced > 100 AND location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM biopharmaceutical_firms WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, industry FROM biopharmaceutical_firms ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT product_name, start_date FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT standard_id, description FROM quality_standards WHERE standard_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE expiration_date < CURDATE();
SELECT name, location, industry FROM biopharmaceutical_firms WHERE industry='Pharmaceuticals';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE();
SELECT * FROM quality_standards WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT log_id, date_time, message FROM compliance_logs WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_time ASC;
